</ul></li></ul><div class="clear"></div></div><ul class="thumbnails"><li><a href="race/tour-de-pologne">Tour de Pologne</a></li><li>&nbsp; » &nbsp;</li><li><a href="race/tour-de-pologne/2009">2009</a></li><li>&nbsp; » &nbsp;</li><li><a href="race/tour-de-pologne/2009/startlist">Startlist</a></li></ul><div class="page-title "><a class="mobileMenuLink showIfMobile menu-toggle" href="">menu</a><div class="main"><span class="flag pl w32"></span><span class="flag pl w24"></span><span class="hideIfMobile">2009</span><span class="hideIfMobile">»</span><font class="hideIfMobile">66th</font><h1 class="">Tour de Pologne</h1><font class="hideIfMobile">(PT)</font></div></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="desktop-ad leaderbord race"></div><div class="mob-ad leaderbord race"></div><div class="top-cont"></div><div class="top-cont-mobile top-cont-mobile-race"></div><div class="page-content page-object default " data-no_menu="0"><h2>Startlist</h2><div class=" ">
<a style="float: right; font-size: 11px; text-transform: uppercase; color: #aaa; display: block; padding: 3px 7px; margin-bottom: 6px; " class="showDiv" data-id="pdfOptions" href="">more pdf options</a><div class="hide" data-id="pdfOptions" style="float: right; "><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=4148&amp;option=ucicode">Incl. uci-code</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=4148&amp;option=gc">Incl. GC times</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=4148&amp;option=flags">Incl. flags</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=4148&amp;option=gc,flags">Incl. gc+flags</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=4148&amp;option=ext">Shirts+info</a></div><a class="icon pdf fs14" target="_blank" href="pdf/startlist.php?id=4148">Startlist</a><select onchange="window.location.href=this.value; " style="font-size: 14px; float: right; width: 120px; margin-right: 20px; padding: 1px; color: #999;"><option value="" selected="">Default</option><option value="race.php?id1=tour-de-pologne&amp;id2=2009&amp;p=startlist&amp;view=nodropouts">Without dropout indication</option><option value="race.php?id1=tour-de-pologne&amp;id2=2009&amp;p=startlist&amp;view=hide_dropouts">Hide dropouts</option></select><div class="clear"></div><ul class="startlist_v4"></ul>
<div class="mt20"><h3>Individual participants</h3>
<span class="table-cont"><table class="basic" style="max-width: 650px; "><thead><tr><th style="width: 10%; ">#</th><th style="width: 10%; ">BIB</th><th style="width: 40%; ">Rider</th><th style="width: 40%; ">Contract team</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>1</td><td>-</td><td><span class="flag pl"></span> <a href="rider/dariusz-rudnicki">RUDNICKI Dariusz</a></td><td><a href="team/dhl-author-2009">DHL - Author</a></td></tr>
<tr><td>2</td><td>-</td><td><span class="flag pl"></span> <a href="rider/marek-rutkiewicz">RUTKIEWICZ Marek</a></td><td><a href="team/dhl-author-2009">DHL - Author</a></td></tr>
